title: Breaking Bad   Walter   And you kick that bastard as hard as you can right in the teeth
author: George Finch
comment: You cut out the best part which was Hanks face upon hearing the advice...it revs him up!

This is the only reason I asked this girl out. She was with another guy and they were flirting and laughing. I was nervous she would say no right in front of him and then they would laugh at me, but I had to try because I knew if I didn’t try at all then I would feel even worse later than if I were to try and get rejected. I remembered that line and did it anyway not knowing if he had already asked her out. She said yes. And now we are dating. The first show we are gonna watch together is breaking bad I swear.

This quote may have just inspired me to get fit and just improve my life.

Gonna come back to this in a certain amount of time
